data.name: Juzzle
data.description:
Juzzle is a modern take on the classic Japanese 2D puzzle Sokoban.  Juzzle may look easy at first glance, but only a select few will be able to finish the game. These friendly faced jellies will have you scratching your head in no time! Work your brain out with 20 levels of adorable frustration!

In each level there are a number of blue jelly friends. Your goal as the green jelly is to push your friends to the blue targets. The order does not matter, but sometimes it takes a little creativity to figure out the solution.  Get your Juzzle on!

changelog.change_log:
- We made performance upgrades to our game engine for Oculus Go, including audio enhancements, and improved level designs.
- Levels have been re-ordered to ramp-up the fun ;)
- Some bugs have been squashed, including a few issues with leaderboards.

- Remove gear vr text as gear vr is not supported
- Level 6 is solvable/easier
- Resolve cube color not showing the correct color at the start of each level
- Add audio to buttons
- add credits

The faster your complete a level, the more points points you earn. 
Compare your scores with other players on the new leaderboard.
